trust.partnership: This academic incubation provides rigorous oversight and validation, ensuring our technology meets the highest academic standards while delivering cutting-edge translation solutions for your educational success.

verification.pageSubtitle: Verify the authenticity of academic documents with our blockchain-powered verification system

loading.title: Verifying Document...

error.title: Verification Failed
error.invalidUrl: Invalid verification URL. Document ID missing.

success.title: Document Verified
